Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Abnormality of the pancreas 90% Duodenal stenosis 90% Abnormality of the gastric mucosa 50% Annular pancreas - Autosomal dominant inheritance - High intestinal obstruction - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
